Title: Nikola Jokic and Jamal Murray too much for Portland Trail Blazers, who fall 111-106 at the Denver Nuggets: Game rewind
Description: The Portland Trail Blazers shook off Monday’s lopsided loss at Phoenix to put forth a much better effort Tuesday night at Denver but couldn’t overcome the duo of Nikola Jokic and Jamal Murray. Murray scored 24,
Author: Oregonian on MSN.com
